mapper.select: SELECT sch_no, c.cns_no, c.cns_nm, c.ofc_no, sch_ymd, sch_hr FROM cschedule s JOIN counselor c ON s.cns_no = c.cns_no
SELECT uno, cns_no, cns_nm, LEFT(GET_CD_NM('CO0020', cns_field), 2) AS cns_field, ofc_no, uemail FROM counselor JOIN user ON uno = user_no WHERE left(cns_field, 2) = 'P1' ORDER BY cns_field
